comment.author: 26105073@N03
comment._content: My grandmother worked at Ryan Aircraft, may have witnessed the November 23, 1947 first flight of the Convair XC-99 at San Diego, California.... This flight is from Lindbergh Field (now San Diego International Airport). San Diego Bay and Point Loma are in the background. Wingspan: 230 feet - Length: 185 feet - Wing Area: 4770 square feet Maximum Take-off Weight: 320,000 pounds Maximum Cargo Payload: 101,000 pounds Powerplant: 6x 3500 hp R4360 radial engines
